title: Christmas videos volume 1 (S)
brief_description: This tape features 6 Christmas cartoons including: “Santa’s surprise”; Santa is given a present when the children hiding in his sleigh clean up his home: “Jack Frost”; the forest creatures happily greet the arrival of Jack Frost: “To Spring”; the elves work at imbuing the earth with warm spring colours while Old Father Winter works against them: “Somewhere in Dreamland”; what looks like being a sad Christmas for a poor mother and her two children is turned into something special by the friendly townspeople: “Fony fables”; a review of classic stories: “The Candlemaker”; a young boy making church candles for Christmas is distracted by his pet mouse.
